hemarathana himayo kiya sitiyaha.in anathuruwa hemarathana himiyan saha amathi es.em. chandrasena wisin janadhipathithuma kandawagena giye dolos mahe dansala pawathwena sthanayataya.ehidi janadhipathithuma, janadhipathi aarya shiranthi rajapaksha mathiniya, manthri namal rajapaksha, aandukara karunarathna diwulgane, manthri shehan semasinha, amathi es.em. chandrasena, palath sabha manthri es.em. ranjith athulu pirisa pamina siti sadahawathunta dan bedimata ekwuha.ehidi janadhipathithuma dansalata pamina siti sadahawathun wishala pirisakata dan bedimata ek wuye mahath sathutini.‚Äùjanadhipathithumani ape es.em. amathithumage balaporoththuwa me dolosmahe dansala wasara gananawak karagena yanna‚Äù hemarathana himiyo janadhipathithumata kiha.‚Äùeeka ithama hondayi.

mudal amathyanshaya nirdesha kala mila suthraya anuwa adhikaranaya indhana mila pilibada niyogayak laba denawa.180%ka anthima asadharana anupathayak petral wani athyawashya bhandayak matha badu lesa patawima aththenma waradi sahagatha deyak.petral mila adu kala yuthu waga adhikaranaya kiyanne mudal amathyanshayama labadun nirnayaka matha padanam wemin.namuth ema niyogaya nikuth kala pamanayi amathyawarunge parshawayen wiwidha wikata jawanika aarambha wenawa.ehema niyogayak dun bawak api dannaha kiyanawa.kole labune naha kiyanawa.thama niyogaya therune naha ee nisa adhyanaya karamin pawathinawa kiyanawa.
